original_title: Forma Otwarta - Ulica i Trybuna przed PKiN
overview: Open Form - Street and Tribune in Front of PKiN. A sequence from the 1971 KwieKulik film Open Form, in which the Polish art collective interrupts and upends the normal rhythms and routines of a city street.
title: Forma Otwarta - Ulica i Trybuna przed PKiN
